snippet: Unilever makes childhood events a part of its new campaign for Ragu pasta sauce.
abstract: Elizabeth Olson Advertising column observes that Ragu pasta sauce is adopting an innovate and funnier marketing approach with a campaign that notes a new direction for its owner Univlever Foods to create a less utilitarian, and more playful, advertising for its food products.
lead_paragraph: Unilever makes childhood events a part of its new campaign for Ragu pasta sauce.
